TextLibrary.Text: Queen Gwendholyn
Your Majesty, I need to request a leave of absence.
Your Majesty, I need to request a leave of absence.
Your Majesty, I need to request a leave of absence.
Your Majesty, I need to request a leave of absence.
Your studies are progressing well. What is so urgent?
Your studies are progressing well. What is so urgent?
Your studies are progressing well. What is so urgent?
Your studies are progressing well. What is so urgent?
My father, Sir Albion, has requested my presence in Siria.
My father, Sir Albion, has requested my presence in Siria.
My father, Sir Albion, has requested my presence in Siria.
My father, Sir Albion, has requested my presence in Siria.
Your father is a good man. He would not make such a request unless it was important. Your request is granted.
Your father is a good man. He would not make such a request unless it was important. Your request is granted.
Your father is a good man. He would not make such a request unless it was important. Your request is granted.
Your father is a good man. He would not make such a request unless it was important. Your request is granted.
Thank you, Your Majesty.
Thank you, Your Majesty.
Thank you, Your Majesty.
Thank you, Your Majesty.
Send your father my regards. And hurry back, you still have much to learn.
Send your father my regards. And hurry back, you still have much to learn.
Send your father my regards. And hurry back, you still have much to learn.
Send your father my regards. And hurry back, you still have much to learn.
I will, my Queen. Thank you.
I will, my Queen. Thank you.
